Effect Both doors into this room slam shut and lock (DC 40). The trap then rolls initiative.

Flensing Floor.name: Flensing Floor
Flensing Floor.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:45] (master) once per weapon rack to detach the triggers from the trap mechanism
Flensing Floor.hazarddescription: Long saw-toothed blades slash up along the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} grooves in the floor, their edges caked with what looks like blood but is in fact a deadly poison.

Divine Living Rune.name: Divine Living Rune
Divine Living Rune.publicNotes:
The most famous living runes are those of the ancient Runelords of Thassilon, resurging as Thassilon rebuilds in the modern era. Other living runes can be found, however, each with its own particular abilities. Living runes can also be crafted to deal different types of energy damage with their Strikes.

Divine living runes are crafted by various churches and sects and typically bear the symbol of a deity, archdevil, or other divine force.

Magic is a complex thing to begin with, and at a certain level of sophistication, the differences between a spell and an autonomous creature become increasingly blurry. Living symbols are constructed creatures of reified and reinforced magic, held together by glyphs, runes, and eldritch formulae.

Truescript.name: Truescript
Truescript.description: A living rune can't speak, but it can sculpt its form into complicated scripts and pictographs that can be understood by any creature with the ability to read written language. A living rune can also understand any written or spoken language.

Backdrop.name: Backdrop
Backdrop.description: When a creature attempts to Strike a living rune and critically misses, the attacker hits the surface (a canvas, wall, or so on) behind the living rune. This might damage the surface or the attacker's weapon, at the GM's discretion.

Surface-Bound.name: Surface-Bound
Surface-Bound.description: A living rune can move only along flat surfaces. If the surface it's on is destroyed (such as a portrait hit by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} spell or a wall being smashed), the rune takes [[/r {7d6}]]{7d6 damage} and is shunted to the nearest flat surface. If there is no flat surface within 5 feet, the rune is destroyed.

Jotun Slayer.name: 巨人杀手 Jotun Slayer
Jotun Slayer.description: 对抗巨人或体型至少为超大型的生物时，英灵战士群集的整齐划一伤害骰获得+4环境加值。

Strike as One.name: 整齐划一 Strike as One
Strike as One.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 英灵战士群集对每个5尺内的敌人进行一次近战打击（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。伤害取决于消耗的动作。

1 @Damage[(2d8+7)[slashing]]伤害

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当英灵战士群集行走时，它们首先用自由动作重整队列，收缩为一个20 x 20的方阵（减去任何因丧失生命值减少的方格），然后移动最多等于速度的距离。这相当于巨型生物移动：举例来说，如果部队的任何一部分进入困难地形，额外的移动力消耗都对整个部队有效。

Dagger Volley.name: 匕首齐射 Dagger Volley
Dagger Volley.description: 英灵战士群集投掷出匕首之雨，这是一种远程攻击。齐射覆盖@Template[cone|distance:30]范围；范围内的所有生物承受@Damage[(5d4+15)[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。当部队规模减少到8格或更少时，范围缩小为@Template[cone|distance:15]。

Pay For Every Inch.name: 寸土不让 Pay For Every Inch
Pay For Every Inch.description: 英灵战士群集重整队列，举起盾墙，然后准备反击。直到部队下回合开始，每次一个敌人进行行动穿过邻接部队的空格时，它承受@Damage[(4d8+18)[slashing]] 伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。

Raise Shields.name: 举起盾墙 Raise Shields
Raise Shields.description: 部队举起盾墙，其AC在部队下回合开始前增加2点。

Song of Freedom.name: 自由之歌 Song of Freedom
Song of Freedom.description: 部队歌唱自由，增强信念和士气。直到部队下回合开始前，其对抗所有心灵效果的意志豁免加值增加为+29，而非仅针对恐惧效果。

Towering Stance.name: Towering Stance
Towering Stance.description:
A nikaramsa is in fact a Medium creature, but appears as a Large creature due to the force of their personality. A creature interacting with the nikaramsa can attempt a @Check[will|dc:36] save to see the nikaramsa as they truly are. If the creature succeeds, the reach of nikaramsa's attacks against that foe decrease to 5 feet (10 feet for their tongue).

If all creatures in the nikaramsa's vicinity successfully disbelieve this illusion, the nikaramsa becomes Medium and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for as long as everyone sees their true form.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.PxLWRiCbgpqOTLO9]{Effect: Towering Stance (Disbelieved)}

Pervert Miracle.name: Pervert Miracle
Pervert Miracle.description:
Trigger A foe within 60 feet casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless} or a beneficial spell that the nikaramsa could cast to remove an affliction or condition (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction})

Effect The nikaramsa attempts to counteract the enemy's spell (counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+24 #Counteract]]{+24} and counteract rank 7). If the nikaramsa succeeds, the triggering creature is subjected to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane} spell or the effect it was trying to remove.

Sap Mind.name: Sap Mind
Sap Mind.description:
The nikaramsa focuses their gaze on one creature within 60 feet. That target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:34] save. Regardless of the outcome of the saving throw, the target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.

Critical Success The nikaramsa is caught off guard by the strength of the target's resistance and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until the end of their next turn.

Success The target resists the nikaramsa's influence.

Failure The target's focus and willpower drain away; it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 1 hour.

Agent of Taraksun.publicNotes:
Lies, knowledge, and deception are a nikaramsa's stock and trade. They are outstanding scholars, with deep and nuanced understanding of religion, philosophy, astrology, and similar subjects. They take particular delight in exploiting the greed and hubris of gullible worshippers, using them to desecrate and destroy their own faith. Even in their goal of undermining the holy, nikaramsas' twisted humor knows few bounds, and they prefer to take on the guise of divine messengers with boons to share. Once they find a likely victim or set of victims, they use their vast knowledge of religion to impart contradictory wisdom, leading to the eventual implosion of the faith from heresies of the clergy and congregation themselves.

Asuras are, above all, proof that the gods are not infallible. These fiends arose as physical manifestations of divine accidents, taking form when the gods themselves stumbled and blasphemed on a cosmic scale. As a result of their own divine genesis, an asura loves above all to undo the workings of the divine. They eagerly travel to the Material Plane, seeking out temples, congregations of faithful worshippers, and religious orders of all stripes to sow doubt and destroy what the gods seek to build.
Agent of Taraksun.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Trial of Tolerance.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:43] (master) to scratch out well-hidden key runes etched into the room's floor, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 36) to counteract the trial

If the target has a type of fear or hatred toward a specific kind of creature, this unexpected figure epitomizes those fears and hatreds. The target must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:46|traits:emotion,fear,illusion,mental] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). If any creature in the room takes any hostile action against the intimidating figure, the Trial of Tolerance uses its Reflective Violence reaction. Once three rounds pass without the Trial of Tolerance using Reflective Violence, the hazard deactivates.
Trial of Tolerance.reset: Once the room is empty of creatures, the trial deactivates and then resets after 1 minute has passed.

Regardless of what this attack appears as, the triggering creature takes @Damage[(3d12+19)[mental]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic] save).

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
You transform into a specific alternate form determined by your heritage. If your heritage doesn't list a form, your alternate form is a tailless form, which is a common Medium humanoid ancestry prevalent where you grew up (typically human). This form is the same age and body type as your true form and has roughly analogous physical traits, such as hair color. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception. You lose any unarmed Strikes you gained from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat in this form. You can remain in your alternate form indefinitely, and you can shift back to your true kitsune form by using this action again.

Gorum's Major Boon.name: Gorum's Major Boon
Gorum's Major Boon.description: When Ordulf is reduced to 0 Hit Points, Gorum feeds him the zeal of his Aesir, allowing Ordulf to draw upon his own life force to fight on and on without falling. He is healed to 150 Hit Points and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (or increases his doomed condition by 1), causing his features to look progressively more gaunt and scarred. Once he reaches @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 4}, he dies.

Crushing Insult.name: Crushing Insult
Crushing Insult.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Ordulf issues a devastating and humiliating insult to a creature within 30 feet that he can see. Ordulf attempts an @Check[intimidation|defense:will] check against the target's Will DC. That character is then temporarily immune to Crushing Insult for 24 hours.

Critical Success The insult is distracting and humiliating; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 minute.

Success The insult is distracting, but its effects pass quickly; the target is stupefied 1 and off-guard until the start of Ordulf's next turn.

Failure The insult barely cuts, but is distracting enough that the target is off-guard until the end of Ordulf's turn.

Critical Failure Ordulf's attempted insult fails spectacularly, and the PC who he was attempting to insult can instantly insult him back, using Insult Ordulf as a free action.

Deadly Display.name: Deadly Display
Deadly Display.description:
Requirements Ordulf is wielding a melee weapon

Effect Ordulf brandishes his weapon in a threatening display. He @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizes} all enemies within 30 feet, rolling once and comparing the result to each target's Will DC.

Whirlwind Strike.name: Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind Strike.description: Ordulf Strikes each enemy within his reach. Each attack counts toward his multiple attack penalty, but do not increase his penalty until he has made all his attacks.

Battle Arrogance.name: Battle Arrogance
Battle Arrogance.description:
Ordulf hasn't met a significant combat challenge in ages, and even when facing deadly foes like the PCs his arrogance can be used against him. If a PC successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarms}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feints}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightens}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trips} Ordulf, his arrogance gets the better of him and he grows sloppy in his tactics, reducing his AC to 34 until the start of his next turn. A PC can also attempt to issue a more debilitating insult to Ordulf.

Insult Ordulf 2

The PC spends several seconds issuing insults and taunts to Ordulf, then attempts a @Check[deception|dc:38], @Check[intimidation|dc:38], or @Check[performance|dc:38] check. If the insults include challenges to Ordulf's bravery, compare him to a troll or a chicken, insult his skill at fishing, or liken him to a witch or national of Irrisen, this becomes a DC 33 check.

Critical Success You strike a nerve. Not only does Ordulf become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} with anger, he is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} from the shock of your words.

Success Your insults cause Ordulf to become sickened 2 with anger.

Failure Your insult only has a brief effect, causing Ordulf to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. He automatically recovers from this sickened condition at the end of his next turn.

Critical Failure Your attempt to insult Ordulf fails so spectacularly that he becomes temporarily immune to Insult Ordulf activities from you for 24 hours.

Consecrated.description: 只要皇冠屯内的加护术仪式效果仍存在，古拉姆战斗祭司的攻击、技能、豁免和察觉检定就获得+1状态加值；这些加值并未算入数据栏。

Effect If Rhysaphine is mounted, he dismounts; if Rhysaphine is not mounted, he mounts the adjacent creature.

Wildfire Storm.name: Wildfire Storm
Wildfire Storm.description: Rhysaphine spreads his wings and spins, forming a whirlwind of flame that deals @Damage[19d6[fire]] damage in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save). He can't use Wildfire Storm again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Wildfire Storm]]{1d4 rounds}.

Greater Flameheart Weapon.name: Greater Flameheart Weapon
Greater Flameheart Weapon.description: hysaphine can call forth a powerful weapon from his heart of flame. In his hands, this is a +3 greater striking greater flaming scimitar that deals 4d6 fire damage instead of 1d6.

Rhysaphine.name: Rhysaphine
Rhysaphine.publicNotes: Peris are contrary, artful celestials renowned for their beauty as much as their deceptive natures. Mercurial, though never malicious, peris strive to aid mortals, though they are more likely to dispense riddles and quests than to offer aid outright.

雪梦熊可以用拟声能力模仿过往受害者的可怖哀嚎。每个@Template[emanation|distance:120]{120尺}内的生物承受@Damage[4d6[mental]]伤害，且必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:33|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

Trackless Step.description: 雪梦熊在自然环境中永远获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]的好处，即使在全速行进时也是如此。

Voice Imitation.name: 拟声 Voice Imitation
Voice Imitation.description: 通过尝试一次欺骗检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]，雪梦熊可以模仿一个遇难者的声音。雪梦熊在这一检定上获得+4环境加值。

Mauling Rush.name: 重锤冲刺 Mauling Rush
Mauling Rush.description: 雪梦熊行走最多等于其速度的距离。它能在本次移动的任意时点进行最多4次爪抓打击，每次针对不同的目标。这些攻击正常计算多重攻击减值，但多重攻击减值在雪梦熊进行完所有打击前不增加。

Frostripper.name: 霜裂者 Frostripper
Frostripper.publicNotes:
雪梦熊在陆地上和水中都十分致命，它是苔原上最令人恐惧的捕食者之一。从远处看，它可能会被误认成一只可怕的巨大北极熊，但任何不幸在近距离看到它的人都会在英年早逝前注意到它多出来的六条腿和令人不安的细长脖子。这些熊般的怪物不知疲倦地在冰雪中跟踪猎物。它们也是游泳健将，擅长潜伏在冰下突然伏击水面上毫无防备的生物，或者潜水到水下寻找食物。

无数爪子和残暴的噬咬已经足够令人揪心，但这些生自噩梦的生物还会用邪恶的欺骗手段，引诱猎物进入暴风雪中。狡诈的雪梦熊会模仿遇险生物的声音，诱骗目标放弃安全的庇护所、开始一次注定失败的营救行动。生活在极地国度的人们已经学会在漫长的冬夜中听到求救声时谨慎应对。

The Trial of Finality.reset: Once the room is empty of living creatures, the trial deactivates and then resets after 1 minute has passed.
The Trial of Finality.name: The Trial of Finality
The Trial of Finality.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:43] (master) to use tools to reflect and focus the light shining from above into the surrounding smoke to disperse it and the hazard's magical energies, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 36) to counteract the trial
The Trial of Finality.hazarddescription: A shaft of light shines from the ceiling to the floor in a ring of slowly churning smoke.
The Trial of Finality.routine:
(1 or 2 actions; emotion, fear, mental) If a creature in area B4 is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} as a result of A Quick Death, the trial's first action is to Sustain that paralysis or unconscious effect; the paralyzed or unconscious creature can attempt a new @Check[will|dc:38|traits:emotion,fear,mental] save at this time against this effect with the same potential results as detailed above for A Quick Death, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save. The Trial of Finality's second action is to manifest horrifying ghostly shapes in the smoke that shriek and telepathically threaten everyone in area B4, promising them their deaths are imminent. All creatures other than the paralyzed or unconscious creature currently enduring A Quick Death must attempt a @Check[will|dc:38|traits:emotion,fear,mental] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} as long as they remain frightened.

A Quick Death.name: A Quick Death
A Quick Death.description:
Trigger A living creature steps into the central 15-foot area of the room directly illuminated by light

Effect The triggering creature momentarily becomes convinced they have been dead for a long time, and that the events of this adventure are but a hallucination. If the triggering creature has come close to death earlier in this adventure, they briefly believe that they didn't actually survive that encounter. The creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:38] save.

Critical Success The creature shakes off the conviction that they are dead and realizes it was a magically induced hallucination. The Trial of Finality deactivates.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, and the conviction that they are dead and now watching, as a ghost, their companions from the middle of the room. The Trial of Finality rolls initiative, and the creature remains paralyzed until the end of the hazard's next turn.

Failure As success, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} until the end of the trial's next turn instead of paralyzed. While unconscious, the creature experiences a dreamlike vision of being carried through the River of Souls toward the Boneyard, where their soul shall be judged.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, or increases the value of an existing doomed condition by 1. If the creature dies as a result of this, the Trial of Finality deactivates.

Prayer Attack.name: Prayer Attack
Prayer Attack.description:
Requirements Dronuk wields a sawtooth saber in each hand

Effect Dronuk conspirator attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If the Feint is successful, Dronuk's next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber in that same turn deals 2d6 persistent bleed damage to the target. In addition, provided they remain visible to that target and that target remains within 30 feet of Dronuk, additional Prayer Attacks against that target automatically cause them to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against Dronuk's attacks until the end of their turn.

You're Next.name: You're Next
You're Next.description:
Trigger Dronuk reduces an enemy to 0 Hit Points

Effect Dronuk attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a single creature he can see. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Tail Trip.name: Tail Trip
Tail Trip.description:
Trigger A creature within Dronuk's reach uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect Dronuk lashes out at the creature with his tail in an attempt to trip the triggering creature up. Dronuk attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the triggering creature.

Mantis's Flurry.name: Mantis's Flurry
Mantis's Flurry.description: Dronuk's multiple attack penalty for attacks with his sawtooth sabers is –2 for his second attack, and –4 with his third and any subsequent attacks.

Frost Roc.name: 霜天雕 Frost Roc

Mist Sight.name: 迷雾视野 Mist Sight
Mist Sight.description: 霜天雕能看穿云、雾、霭以及其他水汽。

Frozen Feathers.name: 冷羽 Frozen Feathers
Frozen Feathers.description:
霜天雕张开翅膀疯狂拍打，在60尺锥形范围内释放一波镀冰的羽毛。范围内的所有生物都必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:34|options:damaging-effect]豁免。[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Frozen Feathers]]{1d4轮}内霜天雕无法再使用冷羽。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[3d6[piercing]]和@Damage[5d6[cold]]伤害。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[5d6[piercing]]和@Damage[10d6[cold]]伤害。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[8d6[piercing]]伤害、@Damage[15d6[cold]]伤害，并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}持续1分钟。

Flying Strafe.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: 霜天雕飞行最多其速度的距离，然后在移动的任意时点进行两次脚爪打击。每次攻击都必须针对一个不同生物。每次攻击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Snack.name: 小菜 Snack
Snack.description: 覆天雕攻击受擒或束缚于其脚爪的生物时，它的喙啄打击攻击掷骰获得+2环境加值。

Snatch.name: 携行 Snatch
Snatch.description: 当有生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于覆天雕的某只脚爪时（或两只脚爪都有），它能用至多半速进行飞行，并带着生物一起移动。

Wing Rebuff.name: 翼返 Wing Rebuff
Wing Rebuff.description:
触发 一个生物移动进入霜天雕的翼击触及范围

效果 霜天雕对触发生物进行一次翼击打击。若霜天雕将生物推离，它打断触发的移动动作。

Frost Roc.publicNotes:
有种故事在酒馆里很受欢迎，就是巨大的覆天雕俯冲下来将牲畜或扫射它的军队带走，扔进血流成河的废墟。但很多人没有意识到的是，在世界的偏远角落里，还有更危险的魔法覆天雕在徘徊。这些体型超群的大鸟拥有和它们生息地相关联的超自然能力，但它们和普通的覆天雕有一个共同点——它们的巨大体型。

霜天雕是适应极地生活的捕食者，外形像猫头鹰。它们栖息在白雪皑皑的崎岖山峰间，或在广阔的冰川裂缝中筑巢，针叶林和苔原就是它们广阔的猎场。霜天雕在夜间活动，往往会在蛾眉月会满月时期连续每晚捕猎几周，而后在新月或云层被长时间遮盖期间（比如暴风雨）进入短暂休眠。它们被训练成为坐骑或守卫时会摒弃这一习性——蛇龙诸王之地或猛犸诸王国度中位于偏远地区的巨人或古拉姆教堂经常这么做。

其他兽形覆天雕 Other Bestial Rocs

其他种类的覆天雕已经进化到适应了偏远恶劣的环境，就像霜天雕一样，它们通常具有某种形式的元素魔力。阿兹兰特西部的风天雕（长得像信天翁）在破碎岛屿的崎岖悬崖中筑巢，它们的翅膀能命令强大的风。在偏远的阿卡迪亚群岛，亮粉色的长腿沼天雕在湿地上大步流星地穿行，使用水魔法帮助狩猎。毫无疑问，世界的其他偏远地方存在更多类型的覆天雕。

Two As One.name: Two As One
Two As One.description: Alktherisa and Omprisgor are a single creature, but each of their heads rolls its own initiative and has its own turn. At the start of a head's turn, it gets 2 actions and 1 reaction. Each head controls one set of arms, but both control the serpentine body. Any ability that would sever a head doesn't cause the conjoined protean to die if it still has its other head, but it does cause it to lose the turns, actions, and reactions of the severed head. Mental effects that target a single creature affect only one of the keketar's heads.

Warpwave Strike.description: A creature struck by a keketar's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:38] save or be subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.HKFoOZZV4WdjkeeJ]{Warpwave}.

Burst of Creation.description: When Alktherisa and Omprisgor die, they explode in a @Template[burst|distance:30], washing all creatures in the area with protean energy. These creatures are healed @Damage[20d6[healing]] Hit Points and must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:38] Save or be affected by a warpwave for 1 round.

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description: A keketar can anticipate the most likely presence of a creature through a supernatural insight into chaotic probabilities and chance. Eat Death.description:
Trigger A creature within Omprisgor's reach is targeted by a spell that deals Hit Point damage

Protean Anatomy.name: Protean Anatomy
Protean Anatomy.description:
A keketar's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the keketar takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, they gain the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case their resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The keketar is immune to polymorph effects unless they're a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the keketar automatically recovers at the end of their next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

The keketar can take the appearance of any Huge or smaller creature. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage bonuses with their Strikes but might change the damage type their Strikes deal.

Reshape Reality.description: When the keketar casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage}, it infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance. Creatures that do not disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on.

Alktherisa and Omprisgor.name: Alktherisa and Omprisgor
Alktherisa and Omprisgor.publicNotes:
The ruling caste of the proteans, keketars orchestrate attacks against the bastions of law and adjudicate protean disputes confidently and capriciously. A keketar resembles a shimmering, serpentine creature with spines, claws, and a dragon-like head. A keketar's actual appearance is in constant flux, but they generally stay about 18 feet long with a weight of around 1,500 pounds. While their physical forms can vary, two things remain constant: first, a keketar's eyes are always a piercing shade of amber or violet. Second, the keketar's mark of office—a crown of shifting symbols that hovers above their head—never changes. A keketar cannot remove their crown but can suppress it, although most are loath to do so and consider such an act one of cowardice or shame.

Keketars fill a role in protean society of a sort of priesthood, operating as intermediaries between the other proteans and the Speakers of the Depths. All other proteans defer to keketars, treating them in a way similar to how citizens of a mortal city would treat respected nobles; even more powerful proteans defer to the will of the keketars. As with many religions, dogma and theology are prone to interpretation and change, and among the proteans, the situation is even more pronounced. Whatever the nature and desires of the Speakers of the Depths may be, individual keketars often come to dramatically different conclusions as to their will and intent. To the proteans, however, this inherent dissonance is a strength rather than a weakness.

Guardians of disorder and natives of the primal plane of chaos known as the Maelstrom, proteans consider it their calling to spread bedlam and hasten entropic ends. The most powerful proteans are demigods known collectively as the protean lords, although they are mysterious entities whose cults in the Universe tend to be obscure and secretive.

Proteans divide themselves into a loose caste system and possess a dizzying variety of powers. Most proteans have a serpentine body with the head of a primeval beast. Scholars have long been intrigued by this fact—that scions of dissolution and disorder would share so many features—pointing out that there is some semblance of order even in the purest chaos. Others note that the serpentine form is one of the most primeval shapes, perhaps suggesting that in a reality at the dawn of time, such shapes were all that could exist. The proteans themselves have little to say on the matter, which, perhaps ironically, only adds to the confusion and lack of consensus surrounding their kind. After all, if even chaos cannot be trusted to be chaotic, would that not be the purest form of entropy?

Gadget Defense.name: Gadget Defense
Gadget Defense.description:
Trigger Zaiho would roll a saving throw against an effect that would cause Hit Point damage

Effect Zaiho quickly procures some outlandish gadget or device from his pouches to protect himself from the triggering effect. Rather than roll the normal saving throw against the effect, Zaiho instead attempts a @Check[crafting] check in place of that saving throw, treating the result of this check as the result of the saving throw instead. If this results in a critical failure, Zaiho's gadgets are damaged, and he can no longer use this reaction for 24 hours.

Fiery Leap.name: Fiery Leap
Fiery Leap.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Zaiho Leaps. As he does so, he throws a handful of explosive devices into a square he was adjacent to just before he Leaped. A creature in this square takes @Damage[11d10[fire]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic] save); that creature and all creatures adjacent to the target square also take @Damage[(11[splash])[fire]]{11 fire splash} damage.

Twinned Combat.name: Twinned Combat
Twinned Combat.description: Any enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against Zaiho's Strikes if that enemy is currently taking persistent damage from or is frightened by any of Shirota's bombs. Zaiho doesn't inflict splash damage to Shirota with Fiery Leap.

Ravenspeaker.name: Ravenspeaker
Ravenspeaker.description: Valkyries use ravens as servants and spies. They can speak with ravens, and they can have up to three raven servitors who follow their commands. Valkyries can constantly observe whatever their commanded ravens sense.

Claimer of the Slain.name: Claimer of the Slain
Claimer of the Slain.description: Valkyries can detect the souls of those recently slain in combat. A valkyrie spends 10 minutes praying over the body of a creature who has been dead for no more than 12 hours; if that creature is worthy of becoming an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.VF81W91YRFgtBLli]{Einherji} and of the appropriate alignment, the valkyrie transforms that creature into an einherji.

Recall the Fallen.name: Recall the Fallen
Recall the Fallen.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An allied creature within 60 feet who isn't a construct or undead is reduced to 0 Hit Points and their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value is 2 or less

Effect The valkyrie restores @Damage[5d10[healing]] Hit Points to the target.

Storm of Battle.name: Storm of Battle
Storm of Battle.description: The valkyrie hurls her spear into the air, creating a massive storm in a @Template[burst|distance:100]. Spears of lightning rain down upon enemies in the area, dealing @Damage[4d12[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic] save).

Valkyrie of Gorum.name: Valkyrie of Gorum
Valkyrie of Gorum.publicNotes:
Choosers of the slain and so-called angels of battle, the song of the valkyries plays wherever steel rings against steel. Valkyries are humanoid individuals of impressive physical stature who seek the most epic battles and legendary conflicts so that they can lay claim to the souls of the world's greatest warriors. The valkyries transform these souls into the implacable immortals known as einherjar.

Valkyries most often serve gods of battle and war, though a valkyrie might pledge their service to any deity they consider worthy. Gorum is particularly well known for having valkyrie and einherjar servants, though he isn't the only such deity. Besmara also has valkyrie servitors, and many stories of "ghost ships" actually reference accounts of encounters with ships manned by einherjar crews devoted to the Pirate Queen.

Bloody Hands.name: 血手 Bloody Hands

Bloody Mess.name: 血腥混乱 Bloody Mess
Bloody Mess.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 B血手向四面八方挥出利爪，让@Template[emanation|distance:20]{20尺半径}内所有活物喷出鲜血，空气中弥漫着细密的红色血雾。区域内的所有生物都必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:37|options:damaging-effect]豁免——已经陷入受伤状态的生物在豁免中承受-2减值。如果多于3个生物在豁免中失败，20尺半径范围内的血雾变得非常厚重，所有范围内生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]，直到血手下回合结束为止。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[8d6[slashing]]伤害。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[8d6[slashing]]伤害，@Damage[4d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害，且因失血陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1分钟。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[12d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害，且因失血陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

Battle Reek.name: 战斗嗅觉 Battle Reek
Battle Reek.description: 30尺。血手散发着广阔战场的腐肉臭气——死亡和泥沼那令人厌恶的混合味道。任何进入灵光或在灵光范围内开始回合的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:34]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（大失败时，只要生物还在恶心就@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}）。在灵光中，受影响的生物对抗恐惧或从恶心状态中恢复的豁免承受-2环境减值。豁免成功的生物临时免疫1分钟。

Leaping Slam.name: 跳跃猛击 Leaping Slam
Leaping Slam.description:
血手行走，然后@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]，它可以在被生物占据的空间落地。所有在他落地点10尺半径内的生物都必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:37|options:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物向旁边躲开，不受伤害，它可以选择任何与血手邻接的空格并立刻移动过去；此移动不会触发反应。

成功 生物受到@Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]]伤害并被推进一个由血手选择且与其原本空格邻接的空间。

失败 生物受到@Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]]伤害并被推进一个由血手选择且与其原本空格邻接的空间，且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

大失败 生物受到@Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，陷入倒地，并被血手禁足。

Bloody Hands.publicNotes:
当血手在外层裂隙中一片偏远沼泽中初生时，他并不是古拉姆的代理人。在生命的最初几千年里，他一直在广阔的泥沼中为自己争战，最终建立了一个面积相当于一块小型大陆的王国，在这里他的统治无可置疑——至少在古拉姆的英灵战士群集入侵前是这样。亚萨神族的战斗力让血手震惊，他继而认为他帝国的覆灭是一种荣耀，而在入侵结束时，他自豪地与亚萨神族并肩作战，无情地摧毁了那些最近因恐惧归顺的恶魔军队。他对战斗的渴望让英灵战士钦佩，但他们不清楚该如何对待这个青蛙状的恶魔，尤其是当他跟着他们穿过大漩涡回到冲突海岸时。在王国边境经历了几个世纪的争斗后，血手对虐待的兴趣日渐减少，对战斗策略更为着迷，他得到古拉姆的允许，成为他的神仆之一。

血手看起来是一个勉强有人形的青蛙状恶魔，举手投足令人联想到一只笨拙的猩猩。他黏糊糊的绿色皮肤沿着手臂逐渐变成血红色，因此他的爪子看起来好像总是滴着鲜血。他长着四只小眼睛，大嘴里满是锋利的牙齿。

曾是恶魔 Ex-demons

恶魔以残忍和它们对混乱与破坏的肆意追求而闻名遐迩，但时不时会有恶魔遇到一些让他们偏离本性的东西。血手就是一个例子，他通过古拉姆发现，恶魔对最纯粹的战争毫无兴趣。

神仆 Servitor Of The Divine

所有神祇都有一群自己喜爱的代理人，负责在凡人间执行自己的意志。神使是其中最为人熟知的一种——独一无二的实体，担任神祇的代言人和信使，通常在凡人施法者以异界侍从仪式的形式请求帮助时被派遣。但神使并不是唯一被允许在信徒中行动或打击信仰之敌的存在。被称为神仆的存在同样独一无二、强大，是神祇最忠实的信徒之一。

神仆相当强大，但并非真正不朽。任何神仆都可能在战斗或意外中丧命。一些情况下，丧命神仆的躯体会消失，留下强大的宝物。另外一些情况，尸体会单纯地倒在地上。依据神祇的意愿，神仆可以被复活，但大部分时候神祇不会立刻施以复活，而可能只是去创造一个新的，或让完全不同的另一位仆从晋升。若是令人难以置信的事情发生——神祇本身灭亡——祂们现有的神仆不会死亡，但会立刻意识到他们的创造者已经死亡。一些神话讲述了神仆获取神力，取代创造者成为半神或真神的故事；在另一些神话中，绝望的神仆可能会寻找一位新神或女神来侍奉。

神仆的稀有度都是独特，大部分时候他们都曾是凡人信徒——可能是类人生物，也有其他——他们都大大取悦了神祇。赋予神仆的力量和能力千奇百怪，但几乎从未有过任何神祇的神仆低于15级，至少也会比他们生前要高上几级。一位神祇保有的神仆数量没有限制，但依据传统，大部分神最多保有三位。

在古拉姆这里，他最著名的三位神仆分别是恶魔、龙和元素生物，它们要么体现了战争的混乱，要么体现了原始的锻造精神。不管是哪种，这些独特神仆的世界观与哲学都与钢铁雄主非常相似，让它们被同类排挤甚至唾弃。然而对血手、圣牙合烈火淬炼来说，生命中没有比侍奉战神更令人欣慰的事了。

Vatumledor.name: 瓦图姆莱多 Vatumledor

Conjure Disguise.name: 唤出伪装 Conjure Disguise
Conjure Disguise.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 瓦图姆莱多变出一具它曾见过的类人生物的完美肉套，之后他将自己塞进去，同时为肉套生成合适的服装。整个过程需要1分钟来完成，期间瓦图姆莱多陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。如果这一过程停止或被打断，肉套被摧毁。一旦完成，他可以永久保持这种伪装。

这种效果等同于变身能力，但伪装的本质并非魔法效果，因此对于侦测魔法戏法或类似效果而言不会被识别为魔法。变形时，瓦图姆莱多失去身体回缩能力。

如果瓦图姆莱多在穿着伪装时遭到重击，肉套被摧毁并立刻爆炸，这具有引爆伪装的效果，但生物使用比其豁免掷骰高一级的成功度。

Detonate Disguise.name: 引爆伪装 Detonate Disguise
Detonate Disguise.description:
需求 瓦图姆莱多正穿着唤出的伪装

效果 瓦图姆莱多破开伪装而出，伪装被摧毁。“爆炸性”的身份揭露对与龙邻接的生物造成@Damage[18d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:39|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物因被伪装的碎片覆盖而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]1轮。任何与瓦图姆莱多位于同一格子的生物在伪装引爆后被推进最近的空格。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 瓦图姆莱多的打击重击时，恢复烟雾龙息的使用次数。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult.name: 对抗异能时全豁免+2状态加值

Retract Body.name: 身体回缩 Retract Body
Retract Body.description:
触发 瓦图姆莱多被一个龙能看到的生物的攻击命中或重击

效果 瓦图姆莱多让被命中的部位回缩或扭开来避免攻击，他的AC对触发攻击获得+2环境加值。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 瓦图姆莱多以任意顺序进行两次爪抓和一次尾扫打击。

Rushed Transformation.name: 仓促变形 Rushed Transformation
Rushed Transformation.description:
频率 每小时一次

效果 在魔法帮助下，瓦图姆莱多竭尽全力迅速将身体重塑为普通的类人生物形态。这具有类人形态法术的效果，但只持续1分钟， 且因为这一变形是用龙的身体粗糙地模仿类人生物，他无法获得欺骗检定上的+4状态加值。瓦图姆莱多可以解消此效果。效果结束时龙会留下魔法召唤的伪装肉片，这可能会暴露龙的存在。

Smoke Breath.name: 烟雾龙息 Smoke Breath
Smoke Breath.description: 瓦图姆莱多释放出一团有毒烟雾，在@Template[cone|distance:60]范围内造成@Damage[16d6[poison]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:39|basic]豁免）。烟雾停留1分钟。这具有迷雾术的效果，但范围是锥形。[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Smoke Breath]]{1d4轮}内他无法再使用烟雾龙息。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 瓦图姆莱多的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的目标额外造成3d6精准伤害。

Vatumledor.publicNotes:
诡谋龙藏身于阴影和上层社会中。这些龙是阴谋家，永远试图操纵和控制他人，为了个人利益或者单纯想要阴谋得逞时的快感。诡谋龙认为自己凌驾于他人之上，它们说话的腔调和用词通常极具煽动性。不过，诡谋龙一般只有在伪装时才会和他人交流，而它们会尽最大努力维持伪装。

各式各样的龙中不少都具有魔法能力，或是与魔法有所联系。相比之下，一部分龙从魔法中获得的力量更强，因此它们能通过长时间浸淫魔法来施展能力或改变身体性状。随着年龄增长，这些龙变得更加强大，与魔法起源的联系也更为紧密。学者为如何对龙进行分类争论不休，一些人喜欢魔法龙的分类，另一些则根据龙与特定魔法根源的联系而用根源分类龙。不论如何分类，龙都有一些共通的特征：它们能够利用魔力，它们的力量和狡猾会随着年龄增长而成长，以及它们都有囤积大量财宝的习性。
Vatumledor.allSaves: 对抗异能时全豁免+2状态加值

Access Pipe Ambush.name: Access Pipe Ambush
Access Pipe Ambush.description:
Trigger Niesha emerges from one of the Sarzari access pipes

Effect Niesha makes a melee Strike against an adjacent creature as she emerges.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The mezlan assumes the form of any Medium or Small creature, excluding those with the elemental, incorporeal, or swarm traits but including specific individuals whose appearance they've seen. This doesn't change the mezlan's Speed or their attack and damage bonus with their Strikes, but the damage type dealt by their Strikes might change based on their new form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Navigate Pipes.description: Niesha can move though the Sarzari Access Pipes, even though they're only two feet wide; she treats these pipes as difficult terrain.
Navigate Pipes.name: Navigate Pipes

Polyglot.name: Polyglot
Polyglot.description: A mezlan can speak and understand any language they hear spoken after listening to the language for 1 minute. These languages fade from their mind after 24 hours.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Absorb Spell.name: Absorb Spell
Absorb Spell.description:
Trigger The mezlan succeeds at a saving throw against a single-target spell

Effect The mezlan absorbs the spell, nullifying its effect and storing it for later. They can Cast the Spell using the original caster's spell attack modifier and DC. They can store only one spell at a time, but they can absorb a new spell to replace the spell they currently have stored.

A willing caster can allow the mezlan to Absorb a Spell without requiring a save.

Discorporate.name: Discorporate
Discorporate.description:
When the mezlan is reduced to 0 Hit Points, their body dissolves into colorless slime and begins seeping into nearby cracks or porous surfaces.

If this material is not immediately contained or destroyed, the mezlan will eventually re-form, though they may lie dormant for years or even decades before doing so.

Extend Limb.name: Extend Limb
Extend Limb.description: The mezlan extends one of their limbs, granting themself a reach of 20 feet with their polymorphic appendages until the end of their next turn.

Up From Below.name: Up From Below
Up From Below.description: Niesha can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} a creature that's standing atop a Sarzari access pipe grate while she's directly beneath that creature.

Viscous Trap.name: Viscous Trap
Viscous Trap.description:
A creature hit by the mezlan's ooze globule takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 minute. On a critical hit, a target standing on a solid surface also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, while a target Flying via wings falls to the ground and becomes unable to Fly.

A target can end all effects by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} (DC 34) or spending a total of 3 Interact actions to free itself.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.iWLAcND0iyW4NUZm]{Effect: Viscous Trap}

Niesha.publicNotes: The bizarre shapeshifters known as mezlans were created ages ago as spies and infiltrators by a long-forgotten ritual infusing a magically constructed ooze with the soul of an exceptional sapient being. Having long since outlasted their creators, mezlans most often dwell alone amongst the ruins of the ancient civilizations they served as mortals.
Niesha.name: Niesha
Niesha.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Bolster the Wounded.name: 支援伤员 Bolster the Wounded
Bolster the Wounded.description:
触发 狂澜结束回合，且HP未满

效果 狂澜恢复@Damage[5d10[healing]]生命值。这一治疗无法将狂澜的生命值恢复到高于当前生命值阙值以上。

Tempest of Battle.name: 战斗狂澜 Tempest of Battle
Tempest of Battle.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 狂澜在@Template[emanation|distance:60]范围内召唤出巨大的雷暴。雷电长枪如雨点般落在区域内敌人身上，造成@Damage[10d12[electricity]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic]豁免）。

Rain of Spears.name: 长枪之雨 Rain of Spears
Rain of Spears.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 狂澜用缠绕电流的长枪进攻，目标是所有邻接的敌人（@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic]豁免）。伤害取决于消耗的动作数。

1 @Damage[(1d6+10)[piercing],(1d12)[electricity]]{1d6+10 穿刺伤害 + 1d12 电击}

2 @Damage[(2d6+10)[piercing],(2d12)[electricity]]{2d6+10 穿刺伤害 + 2d12 电击}

3 @Damage[(3d6+10)[piercing],(3d12)[electricity]]{3d6+10 穿刺伤害 + 3d12 电击}

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当部队行走时，她们首先用自由动作重整队列，收缩为一个20 x 20的方阵（减去任何因丧失生命值减少的方格），然后移动最多等于速度的距离。这相当于巨型生物移动：举例来说，如果部队的任何一部分进入困难地形，额外的移动力消耗都对整个部队有效。

Troop Spellcasting.name: 部队施法 Troop Spellcasting
Troop Spellcasting.description: 当狂澜施法时，部队成员齐心协力施放了更强大的法术。当施放一个具有爆发、锥形或线型范围且没有持续时间的法术时，将法术范围增加。将通常半径至少为10尺（半径小于10尺则不受影响）的爆发半径增加5尺。将通常最多15尺长的锥形或线形范围增加5尺，15尺以上的则增加10尺。

Roc Rider.name: 覆天雕骑手 Roc Rider
Roc Rider.publicNotes:
阿德莱特人居住在世界之冠最遥远、最严酷的地区。乍一看，这些与世隔绝的人和他们的艾鲁塔基人表亲很相似；他们通常有着赤土色的皮肤，笔直的黑发和紧致有力的体格。但阿德莱特人通常比人类亲戚更高大、肌肉更发达。近距离观察时，阿德莱特人的奇怪之处便显露出来：他们每个人嘴里都长满狼一样的尖牙，他们的腿和尾巴则仿佛犬类。

阿德莱特人的传说表明，很久以前，一位强大的猎人在远方迷了路，来到一座用鲸骨和冰建造的房子。一位身穿白狐皮的女性接待了他，提供食水，照料冻伤。后来他们结婚，生了十个孩子，其中五个长着狐腿狐尾。这些孩子和母亲一同生活，而另外五个长着狼腿狼尾的孩子则跟着父亲回到人类的土地，成了第一批阿德莱特人。

阿德莱特人并非天生邪恶，但他们的文化好战、排外且明显缺乏谦逊。他们认为自己是极地荒原上天然的统治者，其他人往好了说是非法居住者，往坏了说是入侵者。典型的阿德莱特人比平凡人类要更快更强壮，有能力赤身裸体穿越暴风雪，也能召唤冰冷的雾气。考虑到这些能力，阿德莱特人的优越感也就不足为奇。尽管阿德莱特人的突袭是在世界之冠旅行时的常见问题，但少数狡猾而勇敢的商人已经与常用路线上的阿德莱特社群建立了和平关系。

Aerial Wolfstorm.name: 空战狼风暴 Aerial Wolfstorm
Aerial Wolfstorm.description: 60尺。一股湿冷的雾气在阿德莱特人面前翻腾。雾中的生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]，雾外的生物对其中的生物也获得隐蔽状态。阿德莱特人可以看穿这个灵光。骑乘一只霜天雕时，此灵光从雕身上开始弥漫（而非阿德莱特人），且雕获得看穿此灵光的能力。

Avenging Bite.name: 复仇噬咬 Avenging Bite
Avenging Bite.description:
触发 一个位于阿德莱特人颚咬打击触及内的生物攻击一个阿德莱特人的盟友

效果 阿德莱特人对触发生物进行一次颚咬打击。

Aerial Wolfrime.name: 空战狼霜 Aerial Wolfrime
Aerial Wolfrime.description: 覆天雕骑手的雾气更为刺骨寒冷，凝聚成一层厚厚的雾凇，对位于空战狼风暴灵光中的生物造成@Damage[7d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:31|basic]），该灵光在覆天雕骑手下回合开始前失效。

Frozen Weapons.name: 冻寒武器 Frozen Weapons
Frozen Weapons.description: 阿德莱特人持用的武器获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]性能符文的效果。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 若一个生物位于至少两个阿德莱特人盟友的触及内，阿德莱特对其的打击造成额外2d6伤害。

Saint Fang.name: 圣牙 Saint Fang
Saint Fang.publicNotes:
这条傲慢自大的龙常给人自以为是的印象。作为正义战争的化身，他认为自己不可能做错。他身上抛光的钢鳞会在移动时发出独特的刮擦声，宽阔的翅膀每次有力拍打时，针状的脊骨都会相互碰撞。圣牙是龙形的战争，一位才华横溢的战略大师。

最近越来越多的古拉姆信徒为了战斗而宣战。他们热衷于以任何借口制造流血，向古拉姆的神仆寻求帮助，但圣牙不响应这些召唤。他更可能出现在一群村民身边，他们整联合起来推翻当地的土匪大王，或者一群正在抵御殖民者的土著居民身边。他认为只要贪婪嗜血之人得到武器，战争就不可避免，而他会帮助那些因为没有和平的选项而发动战争的人。

圣牙很少会让人骑他，但他会服从钢铁雄主古拉姆的命令。神有时会命令圣牙带他的一名虔诚信徒参加战斗，而他会严格遵守命令，常常一到达战场就把他认为不配的骑兵打落下去。

圣牙的过去 Saint Fang's Past

许多格拉利昂的神学学者都在探寻圣牙的起源。最有可能（也被广泛相信）的解释是，他曾在格拉利昂上空翱翔，保护无辜的凡人免受战争蹂躏，但随着时间推移，疲惫不堪的他最终成了古拉姆手中完美的武器。

神仆 Servitor Of The Divine

所有神祇都有一群自己喜爱的代理人，负责在凡人间执行自己的意志。神使是其中最为人熟知的一种——独一无二的实体，担任神祇的代言人和信使，通常在凡人施法者以异界侍从仪式的形式请求帮助时被派遣。但神使并不是唯一被允许在信徒中行动或打击信仰之敌的存在。被称为神仆的存在同样独一无二、强大，是神祇最忠实的信徒之一。

神仆相当强大，但并非真正不朽。任何神仆都可能在战斗或意外中丧命。一些情况下，丧命神仆的躯体会消失，留下强大的宝物。另外一些情况，尸体会单纯地倒在地上。依据神祇的意愿，神仆可以被复活，但大部分时候神祇不会立刻施以复活，而可能只是去创造一个新的，或让完全不同的另一位仆从晋升。若是令人难以置信的事情发生——神祇本身灭亡——祂们现有的神仆不会死亡，但会立刻意识到他们的创造者已经死亡。一些神话讲述了神仆获取神力，取代创造者成为半神或真神的故事；在另一些神话中，绝望的神仆可能会寻找一位新神或女神来侍奉。

神仆的稀有度都是独特，大部分时候他们都曾是凡人信徒——可能是类人生物，也有其他——他们都大大取悦了神祇。赋予神仆的力量和能力千奇百怪，但几乎从未有过任何神祇的神仆低于15级，至少也会比他们生前要高上几级。一位神祇保有的神仆数量没有限制，但依据传统，大部分神最多保有三位。

在古拉姆这里，他最著名的三位神仆分别是恶魔、龙和元素生物，它们要么体现了战争的混乱，要么体现了原始的锻造精神。不管是哪种，这些独特神仆的世界观与哲学都与钢铁雄主非常相似，让它们被同类排挤甚至唾弃。然而对血手、圣牙合烈火淬炼来说，生命中没有比侍奉战神更令人欣慰的事了。

Battle Arrogance.name: Battle Arrogance

Ordulf hasn't met a significant combat challenge in ages, and even when facing deadly foes like the PCs his arrogance can be used against him. If a PC successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarms}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feints}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightens}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trips} Ordulf, his arrogance gets the better of him and he grows sloppy in his tactics, reducing his AC to 34 until the start of his next turn. A PC can also attempt to issue a more debilitating insult to Ordulf.

Insult Ordulf 2

The PC spends several seconds issuing insults and taunts to Ordulf, then attempts a @Check[deception|dc:38], @Check[intimidation|dc:38], or @Check[performance|dc:38] check. If the insults include challenges to Ordulf's bravery, compare him to a troll or a chicken, insult his skill at fishing, or liken him to a witch or national of Irrisen, this becomes a DC 33 check.

Critical Success You strike a nerve. Not only does Ordulf become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} with anger, he is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} from the shock of your words.

Success Your insults cause Ordulf to become sickened 2 with anger.

Failure Your insult only has a brief effect, causing Ordulf to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. He automatically recovers from this sickened condition at the end of his next turn.

Critical Failure Your attempt to insult Ordulf fails so spectacularly that he becomes temporarily immune to Insult Ordulf activities from you for 24 hours.

Cleaving Blow.name: Cleaving Blow

Crushing Insult.name: Crushing Insult

Critical Success The insult is distracting and humiliating; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 minute.

Success The insult is distracting, but its effects pass quickly; the target is stupefied 1 and off-guard until the start of Ordulf's next turn.

Failure The insult barely cuts, but is distracting enough that the target is off-guard until the end of Ordulf's turn.

Critical Failure Ordulf's attempted insult fails spectacularly, and the PC who he was attempting to insult can instantly insult him back, using Insult Ordulf as a free action.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Disarm Vulnerability.name: 卸武弱点 Disarm Vulnerability
Disarm Vulnerability.description: 若第一刃被卸武，他受到@Damage[8d6[mental]]伤害（@Check[will|dc:36|basic]豁免，大失败时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}）。且他无法在1轮内召唤武器。

Conjure Weapon.name: 召唤武器 Conjure Weapon
Conjure Weapon.description:
需求 第一刃有一只空手

频率 每轮一次

效果 第一刃张开手臂握拳；当他这样做时，一把常见的+2高等强击高等星魂近战武器出现在他手中，材质为寒铁或银。如果他放开召唤的武器，或它被卸武，武器立刻消失。如果他投掷召唤的武器，它在被投掷后、可能对目标造成伤害后消失。第一刃偏好使用巨剑进行近战打击，用轻锤进行投掷远程打击，但他无法同时拥有一件以上的召唤武器。

Lord of Battle.name: 战争之主 Lord of Battle
Lord of Battle.description: 第一刃熟练使用所有近战和投掷武器，他能使用所有此类武器的重击专精效果。他用所有近战武器进行的近战打击造成额外1d6持续流血伤害。

Whirling Blades.name: 旋转刀刃 Whirling Blades
Whirling Blades.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 在微弱的凶猛战角声中，第一刃变成一团大型旋转金属刀片，然后行走两次。这种移动不会触发反应，他可以穿过被占据的空间，但他必须在一个未被占据的空间结束移动，移动结束时他恢复真正的形态。在第一刃的行走过程中至少被他穿过一次的所有生物受到@Damage[10d10[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。

The First Blade.name: 第一刃 The First Blade
The First Blade.publicNotes:
古拉姆的神使第一刃据说是数万年前，由古拉姆剑上裂开的一片毫无思想的钢片形成的。它是活生生的战争工具，随着战争面貌演变，第一刃已被古拉姆无数次重塑。第一刃不属于任何特定族裔；它是主人的镜子，盔甲和武器就是他的身体——内里存在的只有空虚。和古拉姆一样，第一刃自认是男性。

神使 Heralds

神使是神灵的代表。大多神祇都拥有一名神使，其任务是充当神或女神在凡人之间的信使和代理人。拥有神使特征的生物永远具有独特稀有度，通常为15级（有时也存在例外）。当神使被杀，与它们关联的神祇可能会将其复活、用一个新生物取而代之，或者极少数情况下过一段没有神使的日子。
The First Blade.allSaves: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Fire Crossbows!.name: 发射弩箭！ Fire Crossbows!
Fire Crossbows!.description:
古拉姆步兵团给手中的弩装填并上弦，然后以齐射的方式进行一次远程攻击。

这次齐射射程为120尺，对@Template[burst|distance:10]范围造成@Damage[6d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]豁免）。如果部队规模缩减到8格或更小，爆发范围减少到@Template[burst|distance:5]。

Raise Swords!.name: 放平长剑！ Raise Swords!
Raise Swords!.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 古拉姆步兵团对10尺内的每个敌人进行一次狂暴攻势，@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]豁免。伤害取决于消耗的动作数。

1 @Damage[(1d12+4)[slashing]]伤害。

2 @Damage[(2d12+10)[slashing]]伤害和@Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害。

3 @Damage[(3d12+10)[slashing]]伤害和@Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害。

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description:
当部队行走时，他们首先用自由动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.OvqohW9YuahnFaiX]，收缩为一个20 x 20的方阵（减去任何因丧失生命值减少的方格），然后移动最多等于速度的距离。

这相当于巨型生物移动：举例来说，如果部队的任何一部分进入困难地形，额外的移动力消耗都对整个部队有效。

Gorumite Infantry.name: 古拉姆步兵团 Gorumite Infantry
Gorumite Infantry.publicNotes:
格拉利昂的大多数城镇都有专业的警卫部队，他们的职责包括巡逻街道，协助有需要的公民，以及在危机时刻做出快速军事反应。卫兵通常成组或以分队行动，但当严重的紧急情况威胁到他们时，卫兵会在最近的要塞、哨站或其他集结点集合，然后去搜寻他们的目标。或者，守卫部队可能会驻扎在城市的重要地点，如城门、监狱、或统治者城堡的入口。

单独的守卫可能不是特别训练有素或经验丰富的士兵，但如果数量庞大，他们就能打败强盗、溜进城门的野生动物，或者偶尔出现的喝醉的食人魔。一组城市守卫通常由一个队长现场指挥，队长负责大部分的交涉场合，并给每个守卫下达命令。该城市警卫分队的成员们一起训练，会执行简单的战术，但不会执行高级军事战术。

Sense Blood.description: 血雾能够感知到120尺内有血液的生物。它能感知到1英里内暴露的血液。
Sense Blood.name: 血液感知 Sense Blood

Blood Siphon.name: 鲜血虹吸 Blood Siphon
Blood Siphon.description:
当血雾用迷雾触须打击对一个生物造成伤害时，生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:38]豁免。若打击为重击，生物的豁免结果视为低一级。血雾从鲜血虹吸中获得的临时生命值在1小时后消失。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，且血雾获得20点临时生命值。

大失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。血雾获得40点临时生命值，其身体呈现一种深红色泽，直到其下回合结束。在此期间，血雾的AC和豁免获得+2状态加值，并且获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]状态。它只能用此额外动作进行打击。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ceOkHxhJNTcvZkCy]{效果：鲜血虹吸 (大失败)}

Blood Vengeance.name: 鲜血复仇 Blood Vengeance
Blood Vengeance.description: 虽然它无法真正流血，血雾也可以施展溢血深仇。除了法术通常的触发条件，血雾可以在目标的穿刺、挥砍或持续流血未对血雾本身造成实际伤害的情况下（不管是因为被抗力抵消或是因免疫流血）用反应动作施放溢血深仇。

Misty Form.name: 迷雾形态 Misty Form
Misty Form.description: 血雾的躯体由半固体的虹色雾气组成，它的浓稠度和厚泡沫类似。这使血雾能移动穿过1寸宽的狭窄空间而无需减速。然而，血雾无法持握物品或与物品交互。它也无法进入水或其他流体中，当被风影响时它被视为超小型。

Bloodfog.name: 血雾 Bloodfog
Bloodfog.publicNotes:
血雾是一种由饥饿的猩红雾气构成的巨大生物。它看起来拥有模糊的人形面孔——但通常也就比都是洞的头盖骨好一点——这面孔不断在雾化的身体中形成、消散。它们红宝石般的卷须触手要坚固得多，可以从身体中滑出，造成很深的切割伤。

血雾喜欢在人口密集的地区，或者发生过大规模暴力事件的地点附近狩猎，它们会漂进来吃东西，再飘走。它们穿过生机勃勃的村子，留下的只有寂静和干尸。人们认为血雾是在它们最常出现的地方产生：军队造成过大规模流血和死亡的杀戮地点。

空无之死的血 Blood Of The Empty Death

人们认为血雾的初次形成要归功于邪恶女神宁布洛斯的影响。虚空之蕨，宁布洛斯早已消亡的故乡，据说那里的整座岛屿甚至次大陆都被巨大的血雾笼罩着。一些人声称较小的血雾不过是“觅食的触角”，它们通过虚空之蕨的单向传送门伸向其他物质位面。

Faith Bound.name: 信仰所缚 Faith Bound
Faith Bound.description: 银剑士无法攻击公开佩戴或展示阿卡艾克克圣徽的生物，除非该生物先对银剑士采取敌对行动。它可以攻击一个它认为对阿卡艾克克信仰不忠诚的、或仅为计谋佩戴圣徽的生物（通常需要先成功进行一次察觉检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]）。

Reflect Truths.name: 真实映照 Reflect Truths
Reflect Truths.description: 20尺。一个进入范围的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:37]豁免，否则它会在银剑士反光的脸上看到自己的脸正注视自己。1分钟内，该生物不能说出任何有意或故意的谎言，且在欺骗坚定中承受-2状态减值。大失败时，该状态减值增加为-4。

Liquefy.name: 液化 Liquefy
Liquefy.description: 银剑士完全液化成为无定型形态。它获得对精准伤害的免疫，但受到双倍寒冷伤害。液化时，它仅能使用移动动作和尖刺远程打击。它可以再次使用此动作来恢复正常形态。

Mirror.name: 镜子 Mirror
Mirror.description: 直到它下次行动，银剑士看起来仿佛一面镜子。它在伪装镜子的欺骗检定和DC上自动取53的结果。

Silver Strikes.name: 银之打击 Silver Strikes
Silver Strikes.description: 银剑士的腿击和尖刺打击视为银质武器。

Swift Steps.name: 迅捷脚步 Swift Steps
Swift Steps.description: 银剑士永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]，它只能用此额外动作来快步或行走。

Evasion.name: 反射闪避 Evasion
Evasion.description: 当银剑士在反射豁免中骰出成功，它转而获得大成功。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 银剑士将视线凝聚到一个30尺内它能看到的生物上。目标必须立刻尝试一次对抗真实映照的意志豁免。若生物已经被真实映照影响，它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。尝试豁免后，该生物对聚焦凝视临时免疫，直到银剑士下回合开始时。

Silver Saber.name: 银剑士 Silver Saber
Silver Saber.publicNotes:
数百年前，红螳螂秘术师制造了这具构装体，在刺客教团逃离拉哈多姆后不久，阿卡艾克克的牧师就为其灌输了智慧，让其作为神圣守卫工作。银剑士的唯一目的是保卫鲜血女士的秘密不被无资格之人知晓。

银剑士静止不动看起来就像一面华丽的镜子，但当它进入战斗时，它会活化成一只螳螂，身躯由几乎呈液态的抛光银组成，人形的面孔一片空白。

作为镜子 Life as a Mirror

银剑士几个世纪以来一直看着阿卡艾克克的信徒，它静静坐在金色镜框中假装自己是面镜子。它相当了解红螳螂的秘密生活，比萨扎里记载得还详细，但它的目的不是记录历史，而是充当守卫——不多，也不少。

The Promised One.name: The Promised One
The Promised One.publicNotes:
This undead guardian stands amid a whirling swarm of shackled spirits that rage against their fate. Bound by a profane necromantic ritual, a nemhaith and its servitors maintain watch over an object or place so important they embraced undeath to guard it. This ritual binds connected beings-friends, family, fellow worshippers, or even sacrificed innocents-to form a single nemhaith.

Most nemhaiths were, in life, priests or protectors who sought immortality to protect the temple they served or guard an important landmark. Others follow an endless and even impossible quest beyond the bounds of life and death. A nemhaith is not always evil at first, but the inherent evil and violence of a nemhaith's existence inevitably darkens even the brightest light.

Site Bound.name: Site Bound
Site Bound.description:
The nemhaith is bound to a place or large stationary object and can't venture more than 500 feet from this focus.

A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
Destroying the ritual object or place used in the nemhaith's creation destroys the nemhaith, freeing its bound spirits to move on to the afterlife.

When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
When the nemhaith damages a living creature with its spirit tendril Strike, the creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Further damage dealt by the nemhaith increases the condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

Rage of Spirits.name: Rage of Spirits
Rage of Spirits.description: The nemhaith's bound spirits rage and smash everything in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take @Damage[4d6[sonic],4d6[void]]{4d6 sonic damage and 4d6 void damage} (@Check[fortitude|dc:36|basic] save).

Throw Spirits.name: Throw Spirits
Throw Spirits.description:
The nemhaith directs its bound spirits as a group to move up to 1 mile away (they have a fly Speed of 60 feet). The nemhaith can see and hear through the thrown spirits, but it loses its aura and can't use its spirit dart ranged Strike or Rage of Spirits.

The nemhaith regains these abilities when the spirits return to the nemhaith's space.

Temperbrand.name: 烈火淬炼 Temperbrand
Temperbrand.publicNotes:
烈火淬炼是一个14尺高的元素生物，外表令人联想到矮人，但她看起来完全是由橙白相间的淬热金属构成的。刀片在她的皮肤上形成、折叠，随着她的移动和战斗又不断弯折，但替代她手臂的长剑始终保持一个模样。她的战斗散发着凶猛的热情，她切开敌人，要么用四肢化成的炽热刀片，要么她喷发出蒸汽和高热空气，用体内弹出的金属片切割肉体。

烈火淬炼是古拉姆创造的现代武器化身，也代表着熔炉那锻造任何战争工具的能力。她来自锻造之心，一个强大的火元素和炉渣吞噬者（Slageater）融合形成了她。古拉姆让这两个元素生物并肩作战300余年，然后将它们融合成一个存在。

烈火淬炼经常被派去支援那些实力悬殊的士兵，试图增加战场上取胜的几率，让战争在古拉姆眼中更为壮观。她可能会出现在军需官面前，用自己的身体为他们提供所需的刀刃、盾牌和护甲。

烈火淬炼的尸体 Temperbrand's Corpse

这位强大的元素生物尚未死去过，但倘若烈火淬炼被杀，她的尸体会迅速坍塌，变为一把强大的魔法大锤。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.596xrLHt1Sx0p7Pm]

神仆 Servitor Of The Divine

所有神祇都有一群自己喜爱的代理人，负责在凡人间执行自己的意志。神使是其中最为人熟知的一种——独一无二的实体，担任神祇的代言人和信使，通常在凡人施法者以异界侍从仪式的形式请求帮助时被派遣。但神使并不是唯一被允许在信徒中行动或打击信仰之敌的存在。被称为神仆的存在同样独一无二、强大，是神祇最忠实的信徒之一。

神仆相当强大，但并非真正不朽。任何神仆都可能在战斗或意外中丧命。一些情况下，丧命神仆的躯体会消失，留下强大的宝物。另外一些情况，尸体会单纯地倒在地上。依据神祇的意愿，神仆可以被复活，但大部分时候神祇不会立刻施以复活，而可能只是去创造一个新的，或让完全不同的另一位仆从晋升。若是令人难以置信的事情发生——神祇本身灭亡——祂们现有的神仆不会死亡，但会立刻意识到他们的创造者已经死亡。一些神话讲述了神仆获取神力，取代创造者成为半神或真神的故事；在另一些神话中，绝望的神仆可能会寻找一位新神或女神来侍奉。

神仆的稀有度都是独特，大部分时候他们都曾是凡人信徒——可能是类人生物，也有其他——他们都大大取悦了神祇。赋予神仆的力量和能力千奇百怪，但几乎从未有过任何神祇的神仆低于15级，至少也会比他们生前要高上几级。一位神祇保有的神仆数量没有限制，但依据传统，大部分神最多保有三位。

在古拉姆这里，他最著名的三位神仆分别是恶魔、龙和元素生物，它们要么体现了战争的混乱，要么体现了原始的锻造精神。不管是哪种，这些独特神仆的世界观与哲学都与钢铁雄主非常相似，让它们被同类排挤甚至唾弃。然而对血手、圣牙合烈火淬炼来说，生命中没有比侍奉战神更令人欣慰的事了。

Molten Spray.name: 熔融喷涂 Molten Spray
Molten Spray.description:
触发 烈火淬炼受到物理伤害

效果 烈火淬炼的受伤部位向一个她自选的空间喷发出熔炼的铁水。任何占据该空间的生物受到@Damage[9d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic]豁免）。

Vulnerable to Water.name: 为水所克 Vulnerable to Water
Vulnerable to Water.description: 当烈火淬炼被一个水效果视为目标时，她受到@Damage[6d6[cold]]伤害，并且因她的身体硬化为固体金属而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。只要她还在缓慢状态，她的AC增加到43。

Hurl Slagblade.name: 猛掷炉渣刃 Hurl Slagblade
Hurl Slagblade.description:
烈火淬炼挥起手臂，鞭打120尺内的一个目标，让她的炉渣刃脱离身体飞出去。目标生物必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:40|options:damaging-effect]豁免。烈火淬炼身上会立刻再生一把新的炉渣刃，但她[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Hurl Slag]]{1d4轮}内无法再使用猛掷炉渣刃。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[5d10[fire]]伤害。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[10d10[fire]]伤害，且硬化的炉渣让生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续3轮。一个生物可以通过逃脱（DC 40）限制身体的炉渣块来结束缓慢状态。

Ooze Form.name: 泥怪形态 Ooze Form
Ooze Form.description: 烈火淬炼的身体变成不定形形态。她的AC变成30，且她免疫重击和精准伤害。在此形态下她陷入目盲（但保留震颤感知），且她的速度降至15尺（最低为5尺）。她能如超小型生物一样穿过空间而不受到惩罚。只要她仍保持着泥怪形态，她就无法进行炉渣刃打击或使用猛掷炉渣刃，但她获得践踏能力。她可以通过再次使用这个行动来结束泥怪形态。

Slagblade Storm.name: 炉渣刃风暴 Slagblade Storm
Slagblade Storm.description: 烈火淬炼对所有触及内生物进行一次炉渣刃打击。她的多重攻击减值在该行动结束前不增加。

Mantis Commander.name: Mantis Commander
Mantis Commander.description: Mantis Keeper belongs to the animal druidic order, yet they don't have a single animal companion. Instead, they are served by the deadly mantises that dwell upon Mediogalti Isle, and their command over them is bolstered by the Mantis Stones. At any one time, Mantis Keeper is attended by two of these enormous insects, each of which treat Mantis Keeper as a valued ally. Mantis Keeper can communicate with any form of deadly mantis by speaking Wildsong to them, although the mantises cannot reply. These deadly mantises do not have the minion trait, and Mantis Keeper need not Command an Animal to command them—they can simply issue orders via Wildsong as a free action.

Mantis Stone Stride.name: Mantis Stone Stride
Mantis Stone Stride.description: Mantis Keeper Steps, Strides, or Flies into one of the Mantis Stones, then immediately exits a different Mantis Stone into a square adjacent to the stone and continues the rest of their movement. When Mantis Keeper exits a Mantis Stone, they create a pulse of lightning that inflicts @Damage[8d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic] save) to all creatures within 10 feet of Mantis Keeper when they emerge from the Mantis stone.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Mantis Keeper's spellcasting action, they attempt a @Check[flat|dc:15]. If they succeed, the action isn't disrupted.

Verdant Scythe.name: Verdant Scythe
Verdant Scythe.description: Mantis Keeper has cultivated a unique seed to serve as a special verdant weapon. When they activate this ability, the seed transforms into a scythe, or the scythe transforms back into a seed. This scythe appears to be made entirely of wood, with a short upper blade that extends into a lengthy mantis-like arm when they attack. Although made of wood, Mantis Keeper's verdant scythe functions as if its blade were made of iron. If they're slain, the weapon quickly rots away, leaving behind rune-inscribed seeds that function as runestones that are inscribed with the weapon's qualities.
